title: Nottingham Ezreal is esentially what is now a Chroma pack

replies.body: Check Kennen out he could make a chroma pack.

Most the old Skins are essentially "Chromas". Freijlord Ashe, Mr Mundoverse, Mercernary Katarina, etc etc...

I mean look at Xerath or Zac. Their skins are basically Chromas.

Also why would they update a ($5) skin that they no longer sell? That skin is literally 5 years old.
So that they can sell again
Or they could make new skins, in which they can sell them to everyone rather then those who don't own the skin.
